metadata.title: Phytoplankton database
metadata.description: Phytoplankton community speciation and abundance, biomass, pigment concentration and composition for various locations along coastal British Columbia. May be data collected for projects such as JGOFS, GLOBEC, La Perouse, SUPER, Line P, Station P, Haida Eddy, euphausid stock assessment, Bowie Seamount, harmful algal blooms.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Physical samples exist for this dataset. Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: As needed

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: These data are provided "as-is".
